# Reproval, Final (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 170

*You jab the stick into your side and twist it, causing yourself some discomfort but creating a killing pain in the target.*

This spell functions like *[[Reproval (Spell)|reproval]],* except that the target dies instantly if it fails its saving throw. A creature that survives this effect is [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round.

*Focus:* A stick at least 1 foot long.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *final rebuke* to *final reproval* to avoid duplication.
